author: Reuters Editorial
title: Brazil steelmaker CSN in talks to sell U.S. unit for $250 mln- report
text:
18 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago Brazil steelmaker CSN in talks to sell U.S. unit for $250 mln- report Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
SAO PAULO, April 17 (Reuters) - Brazilian steelmaker Companhia Siderurgica Nacional is in talks to sell a U.S. unit to Steel Dynamics Inc for around $250 million, according to a report in the newspaper O Estado de S. Paulo on Tuesday. 
The unit, based in Terre Haute, Indiana, has 350,000 tonnes a year in capacity, the paper said, citing sources close to the matter. 
The paper said other companies such as Nucor Corp., Commercial Metals Co and ArcelorMittal SA had looked into the unit, but talks had progressed with Steel Dynamics. 
Press and investor relations representatives for CSN and Steel Dynamics did not immediately respond to requests for comment. (Reporting by Tatiana Bautzer and Carolina Mandl; Editing by Bernadette Baum)
